verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* hearken, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* ye \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* whom \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3548"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* watched \w over|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* Thabor.

\w And|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* turned aside victims into \w the|strong="H3605"\w* depth: \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* teacher \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H7819"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w Blow|strong="H8628"\w* ye \w the|strong="H0310"\w* cornet \w in|strong="H7782"\w* Gabaa, \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w* \w in|strong="H7782"\w* Rama: howl ye \w in|strong="H7782"\w* Bethaven, \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* thy \w back|strong="H0310"\w*, O \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w rebuke|strong="H8433"\w*: \w among|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* shewn \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w which|strong="H7626"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w surely|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* Juda \w are|strong="H8269"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bound: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* \w is|strong="H0669"\w* under oppression, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* broken \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w began|strong="H2974"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* filthiness.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3063"\w* \w moth|strong="H6211"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w rottenness|strong="H7538"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0589"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Juda.
